DASH_BORDER_COLOR - Static variable in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
School bus yellow dash border colour
DASHES - Static variable in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
Array of floats of dashes
debugConsole - Variable in class Main.MVC.GameEngine
DebugConsole to debug the game.
DebugConsole - Class in Main.Consoles
Public class DebugConsole is the container for the DebugPanel.
DebugConsole(JFrame, GameEngine, GameSounds) - Constructor for class Main.Consoles.DebugConsole
This constructor is used to load the DebugPanel into the DebugConsole and to add in window listeners.
debugPanel - Variable in class Main.Consoles.DebugConsole
The DebugPanel which is contained within DebugConsole.
DebugPanel - Class in Main.Consoles
Public class DebugPanel is used to call methods to reset ball count, reset ball and player position, move to previous or next level and set the ball movement speed.
DebugPanel(GameEngine) - Constructor for class Main.Consoles.DebugPanel
This constructor is used to initialize the DebugPanel and add the JButtons and JSliders.
DEF_BKG - Static variable in class Main.Consoles.CustomPanel
Background colour of white for the CustomPanel.
DEF_BKG - Static variable in class Main.Consoles.DebugPanel
Background colour of white for the DebugPanel.
DEF_CRACK_DEPTH - Static variable in class Main.MVC.GameBoardController
The depth of the crack.
DEF_MOVE_AMOUNT - Static variable in class Main.MVC.GameBoardController
The move amount of the player.
DEF_STEPS - Static variable in class Main.MVC.GameBoardController
The steps of the crack.
DEF_TITLE - Static variable in class Main.Others.GameFrame
The game title.
diameter - Variable in class Main.Models.Ball
The diameter of the ball.
down - Variable in class Main.Models.Ball
This point is defined as the bottom point of the ball.
DOWN - Static variable in class Main.MVC.GameBoardController
The code for the bottom side of the brick.
DOWN_IMPACT - Static variable in class Main.MVC.GameBoardController
The code for impact to the bottom of brick.
drawBall(Ball, Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the ball by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
drawBrick(Brick, Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the bricks by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
drawButton(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the buttons of the HomeMenu.
drawButton(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Scores.Highscore
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the buttons of Highscore.
drawContainer(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the menu face of the HomeMenu.
drawImage(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the images of the HomeMenu.
drawMenu(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the pause menu.
drawMenu(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the HomeMenu.
drawMessages(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the game messages to show game condition such as number of bricks and balls left and game focus.
drawPauseMenu(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the strings and buttons of the pause menu.
drawPauseMenuChoices(Graphics) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameEngine
This method is used to draw the detection boxes for the pause menu options.
drawPlayer(Player, Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw the player by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
drawPowerUp(GodModePowerUp, Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.MVC.GameBoardRenderer
This method is used to draw a red circle power up which triggers God mode for the player for 10 seconds when collected.
drawScoreBoard(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Scores.Highscore
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the HighScore.
drawText(Graphics2D) - Method in class Main.Others.HomeMenu
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the text of the HomeMenu.
drawText(Graphics2D, int) - Method in class Main.Scores.Highscore
This method is responsible for painting and repainting the text of the Highscore such as the player ranking, name, category, time and score.
